FuncDef: The display this command displays the configurations of the system in the current view.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays both the configurations that users have performed and default configurations.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a set of configurations are complete in a certain view, you can run the display this command to check whether the configurations are correct.The effective parameters the same as the default parameters are not displayed. The set parameters that do not be committed successfully are neither displayed.Note the following points when using the display this command:If include-default is not specified, the command displays only user-configured information.If include-default is specified, the command displays both user-configured information and default configuration information.
Offline configuration is marked using an asterisk (*).

Precautions
In the view of a specific interface, the display this command displays the configurations of the interface.In the view of a specific protocol, this command displays the configurations associated with the protocol.In the sub-view of a protocol, no configuration is displayed after this command is run.
